name: BDO
description: A leading Philippine universal bank offering extensive branch, ATM, and online banking services for personal and business customers.

name: BPI
description: One of the oldest and most trusted banks in the Philippines, known for reliable mobile and online banking services.

name: Metrobank
description: A major Philippine bank providing a wide range of financial services, from personal banking to corporate and international banking solutions.

name: OwnBank PH
description: A Philippine digital banking platform offering convenient app-based savings and transfer services with flexible fees and processing times.

name: UnionBank
description: A top digital-forward bank in the Philippines, recognized for seamless online transactions and innovative banking solutions.

name: CIMB Bank PH
description: A fully digital Philippine bank offering high-interest savings accounts and fast cash transfers through a mobile-only platform.

name: GoTyme Bank
description: A digital bank combining app-based services with in-store kiosks for easy onboarding and convenient everyday banking.

name: MariBank
description: A digital bank under the Sea Group offering simple, app-based savings and fast transfers.

name: Coins PH
description: A versatile e-wallet supporting bills payment, remittances, and cryptocurrency transactions, with instant cash-in and cash-out options.

name: GCash
description: The most widely used e-wallet in the Philippines, offering instant transfers, bills payment, QR payments, and financial services.

name: Maya
description: A combined e-wallet and digital bank providing instant transfers, payments, and interest-earning savings accounts via its mobile app.

name: Cebuana Lhuillier Remit
description: A trusted nationwide remittance service offering quick money transfers and cash-out options through its extensive branch and pawnshop network.

name: PayPal
description: A globally recognized online payment platform enabling fast international transfers, online purchases, and merchant transactions.

name: Remitly
description: An international remittance service designed for overseas workers, offering fast delivery options and competitive transfer fees.

name: Western Union
description: A long-established global remittance provider offering cross-border transfers with wide agent networks and multiple payout options.

name: Wise
description: A low-cost international transfer service known for transparent fees and fast delivery using real exchange rates.
